title: How to Make a Cheating Boyfriend Feel Bad

steps.title: Go on dates and spend time with other people.
steps.content: Go on dates and spend time with other people. [1] X Expert Source Elvina Lui, MFT Marriage & Family Therapist Expert Interview. 29 May 2019. Knowing that what he did drove you away and potentially into the arms of someone else will really make him regret it. Find someone else to hang out with . You don’t have to take anything further than just spending time with them, but who knows, maybe you’ll meet someone new! [2] X Research source When your boyfriend hears how happy you are with someone else, he’ll know he blew it with you.

steps.title: Your indifference could actually hurt his feelings.
steps.content: Your indifference could actually hurt his feelings. Cheaters can oftentimes be really narcissistic and your boyfriend may expect you to blow up when you find out about his infidelity. Stay calm and composed while you plot your next move. [3] X Research source You also don’t want him to be able make you look bad when people find out about his cheating. If you catch him in the act, don’t get aggressive. Just grab your stuff and go without saying a word.

steps.title: It could make him try to convince you that he’s sorry.
steps.content: It could make him try to convince you that he’s sorry. If you’re willing to forgive your boyfriend, let him know that it’s not going to be easy. Make him live in the doghouse and avoid talking to or spending time around him until he manages to earn back your trust and respect, however long that is. If he’s really committed to fixing things, then he’ll do whatever it takes. [4] X Research source Every situation is different, and you shouldn’t feel pressured to do anything that you don’t want to do. If you feel like you want to give your boyfriend another chance, you can absolutely do that.

steps.title: Make him feel guilty for what he did.
steps.content: Make him feel guilty for what he did. Speak up about how much your boyfriend’s cheating has affected you. Be direct and honest and tell him that you cared about him and what he’s done has ruined your relationship. He may really regret his actions. [5] X Research source For instance, you could say, “I can’t believe you did this. I’m devastated. I really loved you.” You could also try, “How could you do this to me? To us?”

steps.title: Break up
steps.content: Break up with him as soon as you find out. If you’re done with him, be done with it! Keep it simple and direct. Just tell him that it’s over and walk away from the relationship. [6] X Expert Source Elvina Lui, MFT Marriage & Family Therapist Expert Interview. 29 May 2019. It may kill him to know that he’s lost you. [7] X Research source Make him understand the consequences of his actions. You could say, “We’re through. I don’t want to be with you anymore.” Reader Poll: We asked 1226 wikiHow readers how they would respond if they discovered their partner was cheating, and 61% of them said end the relationship immediately. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Place it on his doorstep without saying a word.
steps.content: Place it on his doorstep without saying a word. You likely have some of your boyfriend’s things at your place, so gather them all together in a box. Leave them on his doorstep so he’ll find it. [8] X Expert Source Elvina Lui, MFT Marriage & Family Therapist Expert Interview. 29 May 2019. The fact that you just want him out of your life without even talking to him will definitely feel hurtful. [9] X Research source If he has some of your stuff, you can send him a text asking him to put it all in a box and leave it at your door as well.

steps.title: He probably won’t like having people know what he did.
steps.content: He probably won’t like having people know what he did. You don’t have to protect a cheater. If someone asks you why you broke up with your boyfriend, why you’re ignoring him, or what’s going on between you two, be honest! Tell them that he cheated on you. You can also tell them what you plan to do about it if you want, but there’s no reason why you can’t speak the truth. [10] X Research source Even if you plan on maybe forgiving him, you can make him feel bad about his actions by spreading the word so he really regrets it.

steps.title: Make him regret everything when he sees how good you look.
steps.content: Make him regret everything when he sees how good you look. Get some new clothes and a haircut. Change up your style and go with outfits and accessories that make you look super hot. Feel better and more confident while you get back at him at the same time—it’s a win-win! [11] X Research source Maybe try out some tight-fitting clothes that you normally wouldn’t wear. Make him wonder why he ever took you for granted. Some retail therapy may make you feel less angry as well.

steps.title: Delete his number, unfollow him, and completely ignore him.
steps.content: Delete his number, unfollow him, and completely ignore him. Force him to live with the consequences of his actions without any relief from you. Cut off communication by deleting his number and not responding to any calls or texts. Remove him from your social media so he can’t see any of your stuff and you can’t see his. Deny any of his requests to communicate with you. It’ll drive him crazy and you won’t have the added stress of having to deal with him. [12] X Research source You could even change your number so he really can’t contact you. You can also delete all of your pictures together from your social media so it’s like he was never even there. If he’s really persistent on social media, you can completely block him. You can even ask your friends and family to block him. He’ll feel powerless to do anything to get you back, just as he should. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Being the best version of yourself can be the greatest revenge.
steps.content: Being the best version of yourself can be the greatest revenge. Don’t let his actions keep you down. Show him that you’re better than ever by doing things that you enjoy and make you happy and healthy. When he sees how well you’re doing without him, it’ll make him regret how he treated you. [14] X Research source Try eating healthy and exercising. Sure, it can make you look good, but it can also make you feel good, which can be really nice following a crappy relationship. You can also try some new things that you’ve always wanted to do. For instance, give that yoga class a try, go rock climbing, or take a cooking lesson. Do whatever you think will make you happy!
